name: perfect point cowl
notes:
looking for that one-skein project that’s quick to make and totally stunning? the perfect point cowl is what you need! made flat and seamed with a clever overlap, it creates a flattering pointed front that sits just right every time. easy to stitch and effortlessly stylish, it features caron macchiato cakes!
  
unique features:
  
• overlapped front puts the warmth where you need it
• simple stitch pattern and self-striping yarn combine to beautiful effect
• easy level pattern suitable for all makers
• unique construction allows for a close but comfortable fit for all sizes
• right and left-handed captioned video tutorials included
  
  
materials used:
  
• us - m, 9.0 mm crochet hook
• 300 yards [caron macchiato cakes](https://www.mooglyblog.com/caron-cakes-autumn-2025/) (5/bulky; 80% cotton, 20% wool; 481 yds; 227 g)
• optional: buttons (for decoration only)
• stitch markers
